item.description:
Have dinner as the sun sets and watch the Pink Moon rise over the ocean as we hike along the beach!

The full moon rises right after the sun sets tonight. We'll have dinner while the sun goes down right behind the restaurant.

Then we'll walk across to the beach and watch the moon rise from the sea and hike along the dunes and beach. We should have a magnificent view!

We'll meet at 5:30 pm at Petey's at Rye Beach**

Then we'll do an easy hike along the coast for an hour or two. 

Bring a headlamp or flashlight but leave them off as much as possible on the beach so we can see the stars!

**(I tried really hard to work it so we could watch the sunset & moonrise at the same time. There are two places along our coast where that's possible but nether will be open for the season in time this month. Stay tuned for subsequent full moons, however...!)

Pink Moon -  The grass pink, or wild ground phlox, is one of the earliest widespread flowers of spring. Other names for this month's moon were the Planter's Moon, Full Sprouting Grass Moon, the Egg Moon, and — among coastal tribes — the Full Fish Moon, when the shad came upstream to spawn. This is also the Paschal Full Moon; the first full moon of the spring season. The first Sunday following the Paschal Moon is Easter Sunday, which indeed will be observed two days later.    Pink Moonrise ~7:30pm.

Pink Moon by Nick Drake

Saw it written and I saw it say
Pink moon is on its way
And none of you stand so tall
Pink moon gonna get ye all
And it’s a pink moon
Pink, pink, pink, pink, pink moon
Pink, pink, pink, pink, pink moon
I saw it written and I saw it say
Pink moon is on its way
And none of you stand so tall
Pink moon gonna get ye all
And it’s a pink moon
Yes, a pink moon.

Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.

*Unless otherwise specified, refunds for timely cancellations will be processed the day after the event.

*Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.
item.name: Red Sun, Pink Moon, Wine-Dark Sea!
